jp.ramen

Class RAMENTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.ramen.RAMENTest

  • public class RAMENTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Main test of the API. The tests are more precise because it is necessary to ensure the correct behaviour of the API. Some tests depends one on the other, so all must be executed together
    Author:
    Sergio Fuentes de UÃ±a "sergio.fuentesd@estudiante.uam.es", Daniel Perdices Burrero "daniel.perdices@estudiante.uam.es"
